definition: to invite/to recruit/to levy (taxes)/to draft (troops)/phenomenon/symptom/characteristic sign (used as proof)/evidence
journey/trip/expedition/to go on long campaign/to attack
see 生命體徵|生命体征[sheng1 ming4 ti3 zheng1]

sentences.english: Objective To study the imaging features of Klippel-Trenaunay syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨静脉畸形骨肥大综合征影像诊断的征象。

sentences.english: She presented with a clinical picture of fever and jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 患者的临床征象为发热和黄疸。

sentences.english: Indirect sign including carotid lymphnode enlargement was found.
sentences.chinese: 同时可发现颈淋巴结肿大征象。

sentences.english: You must also face up to guard against the signs of the Xiehuo there.
sentences.chinese: 你一定还在睁大双眼，警惕着邪火出现的征象。

sentences.english: The best artist in the world may chance to err, when he mistakes a true significator for a false one.
sentences.chinese: 当其判断征象星真假错误时，最好的术家亦可能犯错。

sentences.english: Many children are showing evidence of neurological damage.
sentences.chinese: 许多儿童具有神经损害的征象。

sentences.english: Objective To study the CT features and pathological characteristics of perinephric space abnormalities in renal cell carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究肾癌侵犯肾周间隙的CT征象和病理特点。

sentences.english: This appearance and the unilateral distribution are typical of lymphangitic spread of carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 这些征象单侧出现时是典型的癌性淋巴管炎表现。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the character of imaging findings of pseudomyxoma peritoneum(PMP).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹膜假性粘液瘤的影像学征象的特点。

sentences.english: For the decipherment of the sign, however, he bears the entire responsibility.
sentences.chinese: 为了解释此一征象，他负有全部的责任。

sentences.english: This too is a sign of a right-sided aortic arch.
sentences.chinese: 这也是右位主动脉弓的一个征象。

sentences.english: Microcalcifications are the primary radiological indicator of early breast cancers.
sentences.chinese: 钙化点是乳腺癌早期的一个主要放射学征象。

sentences.english: Objective To describe some unenhanced spiral CT imaging signs that can clue to acute pulmonary embolism.
sentences.chinese: 目的描述能提示急性肺动脉栓塞的CT平扫征象。

sentences.english: Widening cavity of the esophagus may be indirect sign of the hiatal hernia.
sentences.chinese: 食道增宽可能是裂孔疝的一个间接征象。

sentences.english: This is a sign of a right-sided aortic arch.
sentences.chinese: 这是右位主动脉弓征象。

sentences.english: Different serosal types could be differentiated by CT features.
sentences.chinese: 通过螺旋CT征象可大致区分浆膜类型。

definition: hematoma/swelling of soft tissue due to internal hemorrhage
